Package <Unnamed>

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CorpusParser
    parses the czech and the english xml file creates for each book a Map Object with the format: Map>
    CorrespondenceParser
    parses the english and czech correspondence files creates a List Object correspondingIDs: [ [en_id, cz_id], [...], ...] pro book
    MainApp
    Iterates over all english and czech corpus files, creates a Corpus parser for each file and gets and writes SentencePair one by one to a file; one file per book output: output_sentences <- files with sentence pairs
    OutputVerbData
    Container class
    OutputVerbDataDictionary
    Processes the data from all output files (folder output_sentences) from the processed corpus and builds a dictionary for each verb:
    PrepareFinalFiles
    Reads selected_n.csv file (in processed_output) -> write .txt and .json
    RepairXml
    The class splits the intercorp correspondence file intercorp_en2cs into smaller files, containing just one book/named collection
    Sentence
    Sentence: full sentence, list of the verbs contained in the sentence
    SentencePair
    SentencePair contains a Pair of the class Sentence: one czech and a corresponding english sentence
    SentenceProcessor
    Initialises a CorrespondenceParser(filename_en2cs) and CorpusParser(filename_en), CorpusParser(filename_cs) Builds/initializes sentencePair-s
    SplitCorpusXmlData
    The class is used to split the files with the actual texts - intercorp_en and intercorp_cs into smaller files containing just one book
    VallexGlosbeDictionary
    Class containing methods that create a VallexGlosbeDictionary by looking up czech Vallex Verbs in Glosbe and finding List of english translations Once created, an instance of the VallexGlosbeDictionary can be used for further processing.
    VallexGlosbeVerb
    Container Class
    Verb
    the Verb class : token, infinitiv, aspect
    WriteProcessedOutput
    uses instance of OutputVerbDataDictionary to select for each verb occuring in the corpus data the first two sentences of occurance
